responses.rationale: The segment describes the location of cases, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes confirmation of cases, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes the scale of confirmed cases, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes the mechanism of spread, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes new cases and impact (culling), not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes cumulative impact (culling), not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes cumulative impact (culling), not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment provides background information, not capabilities or preparedness.
